programme.title: Vincent Price: Master of the Silver Scream
programme.desc: From 'Haunted Hill' to Corman classics, Vincent Price sent shivers down the spines of horror fans for decades.

programme.title: Stephen King Stories and Decoding David Lynch
programme.desc: From Carrie to Eraserhead and beyond, Stephen King and David Lynch have defined cinematic storytelling for decades.

programme.title: Joe Dante’s Noir Nightmares
programme.desc: TFH creator Joe Dante celebrates the noir classics that explore themes of identity, paranoia, and duality.

programme.title: Terror Titans: The Films of Wes Craven and John Carpenter
programme.desc: Two masters of horror bring your nightmares to the big screen in this spine-chilling collection.

programme.title: The Best of Blaxploitation
programme.desc: From Shaft to Coffy to Truck Turner and more, celebrating the best action films of the Blaxploitation genre.

programme.title: The Black Cobra 2
programme.desc: Chicago cop Robert Malone (Fred Williamson) finds himself in The Philippines, ostensibly to learn the techniques of Interpol. Before he exits the Manila airport, his wallet is stolen by a pickpocket. Malone endures a testy relationship with his new colleague Kevin McCall while evidence surrounding the stolen wallet pulls both of them deeper and deeper into a web of intrigue.

programme.title: Rebels, Icons, and Revolution: A Journey Through Black Cinema
programme.desc: Celebrating the bold storytelling, unforgettable characters, and cultural impact of Black cinema.

programme.title: The Final Comedown
programme.desc: Billy Dee Williams stars as the leader of a group of young militants battling injustice and racism in this film also released under the title Blast!

programme.title: Cinematic Soul: Black Stories in Film
programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers discuss the action, resilience, and cultural impact of Black cinema throughout the decades.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: ‘Shaft,” and “Foxy Brown” all rolled out to the “Car Wash” with “Sweet Sweetbacks Badasss Song” on the radio!

programme.title: Joshua
programme.desc: A former Union soldier becomes a bounty hunter and vows to track down the racist thugs that murdered his mother.

programme.title: Best of the West Vol. 1
programme.desc: Return to the outlaw days of the Old West with classics starring Clint Eastwood, John Wayne, and more.

programme.title: God's Gun
programme.desc: A gunman (Jack Palance) makes a fatal mistake when he and his gang ravage a town and murder the local priest (Lee Van Cleef). Now, the priest’s twin brother vows revenge, and teams with a local boy (Leif Garrett) to bring the gunman and his gang to their knees. Lee Van Cleef played dual roles in this 1977 Spaghetti Western produced by Golan-Globus Productions.

programme.title: Best of the West Vol. 2
programme.desc: Saddle up as your favorite filmmakers talk beloved big screen Westerns!

programme.title: Clint Eastwood: Outlaw Spirit
programme.desc: From gunslingers to rebel heroes, Clint Eastwood brings grit, charm, and intensity in a way that no other movie star can.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Jane Russell sizzles on screen as Rio McDonald, a woman caught in the paths of Wild West legends Billy the Kid, Doc Holliday, and Pat Garrett. This 1943 blockbuster, directed by Howard Hughes, was famously controversial for its depiction of Russell, who became a sex symbol after its release.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Step back into the 1950s, the Golden Age of Hollywood, and discover the timeless classics and star-studded films that captivated audiences.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Explore the innovations and cinematic spectacles of the 1950s, a decade marked by the advent of widescreen formats and epic storytelling.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers explore the revolutionary changes in 1960s cinema, where bold new voices and innovative techniques transformed the film industry.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Celebrate the iconic movies and unforgettable performances that defined the 1960s, leaving a lasting legacy on film history.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Here's how the films of the 1960s mirrored the decade's social and cultural upheavals, capturing the spirit of a transformative era.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Revisit the groundbreaking era of New Hollywood, where visionary directors redefined cinema with bold storytelling and innovative techniques.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers look back on the 1970s films that captivated audiences and became cult classics.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers examine the 1970s movies that pushed the boundaries of conventional filmmaking.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers cracked open the 1980s time capsule, and here's what they found.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: These are the films that thrilled a generation of moviegoers and defined the 1980s.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.sub-title: 80s Cinema Vol. 3: Dark Worlds and Danger
programme.desc: Journey through horror, sci-fi, and unforgettable adventures with this pulse-pounding collection of 80s blockbusters and cult classics.

programme.title: 80s Cinema Vol. 4: Strange Lands and Unlikely Heroes
programme.desc: The 80s get crazy with comedy, horror, and high-stakes action flicks that break all the rules.

programme.title: 80s Cinema Vol. 5: Chaos Unleashed
programme.desc: Brace yourself for wild thrills, dark mysteries, and heart-racing horror in this action-packed and genre-bending 80s collection.

programme.title: 80s Cinema Vol. 6: Twisted Tales and Cinematic Thrills
programme.desc: Experience a flashback of horror, drama, and sci-fi with this unforgettable blend of unsettling and iconic 80s classics.
